channel.title: Ranging broken on EasyRSC source
channel.description: Either ranging is broken, or a custom NPC is too high levelled... I bet its ranging though... I shoot an arrow(it doesn't show), my entire server just dies.. anyone else have this problem?

item.title: Ranging broken on EasyRSC source
item.dc:creator: @Dragon487 Dragon487
item.description:
@Dragon487 wrote:

Ill attempt to post error log. The npc I’m attacking has 300K health… So could be error handling 300000… Doubt it though. I’ll try ranging other monsters tomorrow and see how client responds.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 25, 2009, 09:14:18 am[/size][hr]This is log:
Buildfile: build.xml

runserver:
[java] Exception in thread “Thread-3” java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: n
must be positive
[java] at java.util.Random.nextInt(Unknown Source)
[java] at org.rscdaemon.server.util.DataConversions.random(DataConversi
ons.java:283)
[java] at org.rscdaemon.server.util.DataConversions.randomWeighted(Data
Conversions.java:303)
[java] at org.rscdaemon.server.util.Formulae.calcRangeHit(Formulae.java
:474)
[java] at org.rscdaemon.server.event.RangeEvent.run(RangeEvent.java:83)

 [java]     at org.rscdaemon.server.DelayedEventHandler.doEvents(DelayedEven

tHandler.java:55)
[java] at org.rscdaemon.server.GameEngine.processEvents(GameEngine.java
:141)
[java] at org.rscdaemon.server.GameEngine.run(GameEngine.java:82)

Happens whenever I try to range anything.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 25, 2009, 09:58:01 am[/size][hr]PROBLEM RESOLVED: Range level was not high enough for the bow.

Read full topic

item.title: Ranging broken on EasyRSC source
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

I highly doubt that it is an easy-rsc problem. Did you change/edit anything that might have caused this problem?
